system.description:
Also at 10th level, you gain a connection to the fires of Heaven or the flames of Hell. Choose one of the following options when you gain this feature:

Heavenly Fire

When you deal fire damage or radiant damage, at your option you can have that damage dealt be half fire damage and half radiant damage.
In addition, you may choose to have your fire spells heal rather than harming, restoring hit points equal to half the damage they would normally do. You may use this feature a number of times equal to half your proficiency bonus and regain all uses upon finishing a long rest.

Hellfire

When you deal fire damage or necrotic damage, at your option you can have that damage dealt be half fire damage and half necrotic damage.

In addition, you may have your flames burn away the life essence of creatures. When you deal fire damage to a creature, you can use this feature (no action required) to decrease the creature’s maximum hit points by an amount equal to the fire damage it dealt. You can use this feature a number of times per day equal to half your proficiency bonus, and you regain all uses upon finishing a long rest.
